name: Mojito
description: A classic Cuban cocktail that perfectly balances white rum with fresh mint, lime juice, and sugar. This refreshing cocktail originated in Havana and has become one of the world's most popular rum-based drinks.

attributes.value: White Rum, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup, Fresh Mint, Soda Water

In a collins glass, gently muddle 6-8 mint leaves with 0.75 oz simple syrup. Add 2 oz white rum and 1 oz fresh lime juice. Fill glass with crushed ice, stir, and top with soda water. Gently stir to combine
